configChromaKeyHelp: Renders OSD above a <0>colored background</0> rather than the actual video. The DVR video is still used (currently) for timing purposes, though.
fileDropHelp: Puoi trascinare e rilasciare qui ogni tuo file, oppure cliccare e selezionarli individualmente.
